entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Yarmouth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:10 p.m. ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 8.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Yarmouth Airport 7:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 8.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 76 %
Dewpoint: 4.3°C
Wind: SSE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast late in the afternoon. High 13 except 9 along parts of the coast. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning after midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast late in the evening and overnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.summary: Rain. Windy. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Saturday 29 April 2023
